Summary: Huge area of bright red and white lights about 100 ft high
divs: sighting detailsdriving home december 24th around 7:30-7:45 on norwood rd toward rt.108 in sandy spring \ olney area. object came over trees from my right and directly in front of my car going towards the left. it was huge. i couldn't make out any shape of the object, just incredibly bright red and white lights all over it. it was moving extremely fast towards new hampshire ave. area. i would estimate that it was as large as 3 to 4 school buses lined together and not high from the ground at all. i had my window open because i smoke and there was no noise from this object at all. i can honestly say it scared the heck out of me. it was so big and bright. i don't know what it was but my daughter was with me and she saw it too. there is a police helicopter site nearby but this was absolutely no helicopter taking off because of the lack of sound and the enormity of its size. i hope someone else writes about this because there were atleast 2 cars behind me at the time.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Ashton-Sandy Spring
This sighting has never been favorited.
